title: Projects
text:
A curated selection of my academic, technical, and independent projects showcasing analytics, machine learning, research, and product thinking.



Type: Research + Machine Learning
This project models how cognitive performance changes under high-stress conditions using behavioral and physiological data.
Key Focus Areas - Cognitive load modeling
- Feature engineering for high-stress signals
- Supervised ML models for performance prediction
Tools & Technologies: Python, Scikit-Learn, Pandas, NumPy
Status: Research & model development in progress




Type: Product + UX + Analytics
Designed a concept for a cognitive tracking system for motorsport drivers that measures reaction time, fatigue, and post-race performance insights.
Key Features - Reaction time & fatigue scoring
- AI-generated post-race debrief
- Performance trend visualization
- UX design for high-pressure environments
Tools & Technologies: UX Research, Figma, Python (planned), Data Visualization, Streamlit
Status: Concept & design phase




Type: Analytics & Optimization
Optimized residential real estate investments to maximize Net Present Value (NPV) over multiple quarters.
Key Focus Areas - Revenue forecasting
- Cost optimization
- Decision-based modeling
Tools & Technologies: Excel Solver, Regression Models, Financial Analysis
Context: Academic project (Applied Business Analytics)




Type: Machine Learning & Business Analytics
Built a machine learning model to estimate Customer Lifetime Value and segment customers by predicted value.
Key Focus Areas - Revenue impact analysis
- Customer segmentation
- Model interpretability
Tools & Technologies: Python, Scikit-Learn, Pandas, Data Visualization
Status: Model and dashboard development in progress




Type: Academic Project + ML + Big Data Analytics
Analyzed Lightcast job postings data using ML and EDA to extract insights on labor market trends and skills demand.
Key Focus Areas - Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) on large-scale job postings
- Machine learning for classification and prediction of job trends
- SQL querying and aggregation for insights
- Cloud-based processing using AWS and PySpark
Tools & Technologies: Python, PySpark, SQL, AWS, Quarto
Status: Completed academic project




Type: Technical Project + Dashboard
Built an interactive dashboard to visualize Formula 1 driver performance with track maps, telemetry plots, and driver style comparison.
Key Features - Track map visualization
- Telemetry plots (speed, braking, acceleration)
- Driver style comparison panel
- Real-time data updates
Tools & Technologies: Python, Dash, Plotly, Pandas
Status: Completed




Type: Machine Learning + Research
Performed EDA and ML on neuro-inspired datasets to identify patterns related to attention, fatigue, and performance variability.
Key Focus Areas - Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)
- Feature engineering
- Supervised and unsupervised ML models
- Visualization of cognitive patterns
Tools & Technologies: Python, Scikit-Learn, Pandas, NumPy
Status: Completed




Type: Dashboard + Analytics
Developed a real-time dashboard for analyzing brand sentiment using textual data and social media.
Key Features - Sentiment trends visualization
- Brand risk assessment
- Comparative analysis across brands or time periods
- Exportable insights for reports
Tools & Technologies: Python, Dash, Plotly, Pandas, Scikit-Learn
Status: Completed

Each project reflects my approach to analytical rigor, real-world impact, and thoughtful visualization. I continuously update this portfolio as I build new projects and refine existing ones.

title: About
text:
Hello! I’m Kriti Singh, a graduate student at Boston University pursuing a Master’s in Applied Business Analytics.
I’m passionate about data, AI, and human performance, and I love applying analytics to understand behavior, optimize decisions, and build actionable insights.




Machine Learning & Predictive Modeling

Cognitive Performance Research & Neuroanalytics

Motorsport Data Analytics

Data-driven Decision Making

UX/UI Design & Product Thinking

Cloud Tools: AWS, PySpark, SQL






Build industry-level analytics projects combining ML, data visualization, and UX.

Publish research papers on cognitive performance ML.

Develop AI-driven tools and dashboards for real-world applications.

Create a cognitive tracker app for motorsport drivers.

Secure roles as a Data Scientist or ML Engineer in analytics-driven organizations.





Programming & Analytics: Python, SQL, PySpark, Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-Learn
Visualization & Dashboards: Dash, Plotly, Streamlit, Tableau, Matplotlib, Seaborn
Cloud & Big Data: AWS, PySpark
UX/UI & Design Tools: Figma, UX Research

This website is a growing portfolio that showcases my projects, skills, and ongoing research. Each project reflects my focus on analytical rigor, real-world impact, and thoughtful visualization.

title: Contact
text:
Contact
I’m always open to discussing projects, research collaborations, internships, and analytics opportunities.
You can reach me through the following channels:

Email: kritisi@bu.e

GitHub: https://github.com/KRITISIN-GH

Linkedin:https://www.linkedin.com/in/kriti-singh-258120311/ Feel free to connect — I’m happy to share more about my work and experiences.
